gameDetails.name: Too Many Bones: Nugget
gameDetails.description:
Description from the publisher:

Enhance your Too Many Bones experience by adding Nugget, the Treasure Hunter! Nugget adds numerous new tactical options to your party. Find legendary treasure, attack before you move, and use sling stones to perform both ranged and melee attacks! Nugget is a versatile Gearloc who is invaluable for both solo and coop play.

Nugget comes with her own set of 21 beautiful custom dice, an 11.5 gram chip, closeable dice holder, and a neoprene character mat.
